text: TMF Dance (formerly "TMF Party") was a digital theme channel part of MTV Networks Benelux. The channel, along with the channels TMF Pure, TMF NL, and Nick Jr., launched on 1 May 2005. The purpose of the TMF Dance was to play a nonstop mix of dance music. On 31 December 2011 all TMF channels, including TMF Dance, were closed down due to MTV strengthening its own brand. ==References== Category:Music television channels Category:Defunct television channels in the Netherlands Category:Television channels in Flanders Category:Television channels in Belgium Category:Television channels and stations established in 2005 Category:Television channels and stations disestablished in 2011 Category:Music organisations based in the Netherlands
title: TMF Dance
